name: The Lord of the Rings Onlineâ„¢
notes:
At the end on the installer do not launch game and allow the installer to complete.
During first launch the Akamai client will be installed which is used to download/update the game files

game.exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/StandingStoneGames/The Lord of the Rings Online/TurbineLauncher.exe

task.description: Setting Windows version to Visual C++ 2017
task.name: winetricks

content:
files:
- lotro_installer: http://content.turbine.com/sites/clientdl/lotro/lotrolive.exe
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/StandingStoneGames/The Lord of the Rings Online/TurbineLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    description: Installing fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    description: Setting Windows version to Visual C++ 2017
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: winxp
    description: Setting Windows version to XP
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: --mode unattended
    executable: lotro_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
